PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-11462022-10-20,  ,  ,  ,  IRCC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (National Occupational Classification 2021)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (NATIONAL OCCUPATIONAL CLASSIFICATION 2021) in order to (1) replace references to the terminology and structure used in previous versions of the National Occupational Classification; and (2) clarify the version incorporated by reference in Section 2 of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0221 Publication Date: 2022-11-09
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (National Occupational Classification 2021)
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (NATIONAL OCCUPATIONAL CLASSIFICATION 2021) in order to (1) replace references to the terminology and structure used in previous versions of the National Occupational Classification; and (2) clarify the version incorporated by reference in Section 2 of the Regulations.
